meaningMnemonic: This <kanji>earth</kanji> <kanji>belt</kanji> is the area within the belt, which holds this area of earth in. It is separate from the rest of the earth, making it its own <vocabulary>zone</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>district</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
